title: League Installer Not working
body: I am trying to install league on a windows vista machine. it has the required amount of ram and hd space etc. but when i click the installer it does nothing. its like i didnt click it. ive tried running as admin but to no avail. ive also redownloaded it man times. Unfortunately nothing i have tried works. Any ideas?

replies.body: We don't support that OS, but I'm thinking that you may not have it updated to have the products required to install.  For example, make sure that your OS is updated all the way to Service Pack 2, which should allow you to continue with installation.  Hope that helps!
